issue.title: Rendering errors when running headless on remote machine

content.raw:
As of today, I have not been having issues at all with my local environment. 

For the remote environment, there seems to be a known issue with OGRE and X forwarding: [https://answers.ros.org/question/27695/x11-forwarding-and-ros-visualization-tools/](https://answers.ros.org/question/27695/x11-forwarding-and-ros-visualization-tools/)
content.html:
As of today, I have not been having issues at all with my local environment.

For the remote environment, there seems to be a known issue with OGRE and X forwarding: https://answers.ros.org/question/27695/x11-forwarding-and-ros-visualization-tools/
